summary: Provides DCE/RPC client structures and call wrappers for the Windows Workstation (WKST) interface, defining NDR data types such as character arrays and encrypted passwords, and exposing functions to perform workstation management operations like domain join/unjoin, computer name handling, network resource usage, and retrieving workstation statistics.
business_intent: Allows security tools and penetration testing frameworks to programmatically interact with Windows workstation configuration via RPC, enabling automated queries and modifications of domain membership, computer naming, network connections, and workstation status for assessment or exploitation purposes.
